Index entries for sequences computed from indices in prime factorization
Index entries for sequences related to sigma(n)
program: A003973(n) = { my(f = factor(n)); for(i=1, #f~, f[i, 1] = nextprime(f[i, 1]+1)); sigma(factorback(f)); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 06 2020
